title: Hung V. Nguyen Title: Senio ...
body:
Hung V. Nguyen  

 Title: Senior special agent, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement Office of Investigations. 

 Age: 33. 

 Birthplace: Vietnam. 

 Education: BA, criminal justice, Western Illinois University. 

 Career: Immigration inspector in Detroit, 1996-1998; immigration agent, 1998-present. 

 Family: Married. 

 Hobbies:  Working out at gym; watching movies. 

 Last Book Read: "The Da Vinci Code."
